content.question: Based on the diagram, organic solids that have settled to the bottom of the treatment tanks in step <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are transferred to which of the following for further processing?
